input: "We are currently seeking a skilled Social Media Video Marketing Specialist to assist us in promoting our new video content on Instagram. As a DJI Academy partner, we aim to showcase our content within various DJI groups in Spain and beyond. While we excel in creating captivating videos for platforms like YouTube and Facebook, we lack expertise in optimizing video content for Instagram. We are seeking an individual who can strategize and execute a plan to publish our videos on Instagram, ensuring maximum visibility and engagement.Responsibilities:1. Develop a comprehensive strategy to promote our video content on Instagram, targeting DJI enthusiast groups in Spain and other relevant communities.2. Optimize video content for Instagram, ensuring it adheres to platform-specific guidelines and best practices.3. Create compelling captions and hashtags to accompany each video post, driving engagement and expanding our reach.4. Collaborate with our creative team to tailor content for Instagram's audience, utilizing features such as Stories, Reels, and IGTV to maximize impact.5. Monitor engagement metrics and analyze performance data to refine our approach and enhance our social media marketing efforts.6. Stay updated on the latest trends and features on Instagram, implementing innovative strategies to maintain a competitive edge.7. Provide regular progress reports and insights to the team, highlighting successes and identifying areas for improvement.Requirements:1. Proven experience in social media marketing, with a focus on video content promotion and engagement.2. Strong understanding of Instagram's platform dynamics and algorithms, with a track record of successful campaigns.3. Proficiency in video editing software and tools, with the ability to optimize content for various social media platforms.4. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with a keen eye for detail in crafting captions and messaging.5. Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities, with a passion for driving results and exceeding objectives.6. Ability to work independently and collaboratively within a team, managing multiple projects and deadlines effectively.7. Familiarity with the DJI brand and enthusiast communities is a plus.If you are passionate about social media marketing and have the skills to help us elevate our presence on Instagram, we would love to hear from you. Join us in spreading our message to a wider audience and maximizing the reach of our video content.Hourly Range: $15.00-$50.00Posted On: February 19, 2024 13:26 UTCCategory: Social Media MarketingSkills:Social Media Management, Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Social Media Content, Social Media Content CreationSkills: Social Media Management, Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation"

input: "Titre de l'annonce : Recherche Intégrateur Produit WooCommerce et Webmaster WordPress Expérimenté pour Partenariat à Long TermeDescription :Nous sommes une entreprise évoluant dans le secteur du dropshipping, à la recherche d'un professionnel pour intégrer des produits sur WordPress WooCommerce ainsi que d'un webmaster WordPress expérimenté pour un partenariat à long terme. Nous cherchons des individus passionnés, motivés, et dotés d'une expertise technique solide, capables de prendre en charge un projet de A à Z.Responsabilités :Intégration de produits : création de fiches produit de 300 mots, optimisation SEO, nettoyage et optimisation des photos (Photoshop), création de métadescriptions.Maintenance régulière des sites existants, améliorations via ELEMENTOR, JetEngine, et optimisation Shoptimizer pour WooCommerce.Résolution de conflits de plugins et problèmes sur le serveur PHP.Suivi des performances via Google Analytics et Google Search Console.Compétences requises :Expérience avérée avec WordPress et WooCommerce.Maîtrise du français à l'oral et à l'écrit (impératif).Compétences en design graphique, notamment avec Photoshop.Solides connaissances en SEO, y compris l'optimisation des images et des métadonnées.Capacité à travailler avec des outils de création de contenu comme ChatGPT pour la rédaction de fiches produit.Expérience avec Google Analytics et Google Search Console.Aptitude à résoudre des problèmes techniques et à optimiser les performances des sites web.Conditions :Doit parler français à l'orale, car des conférences vidéo régulières seront nécessaires pour le suivi du projet. Ce point est impératif ; si votre maîtrise du français dépend de Google Translate, cette offre n'est pas pour vous.Disponibilité pour un partenariat à long terme, avec une communication ouverte et régulière.Capacité à fournir un portfolio ou des exemples de travaux antérieurs spécifiques à nos besoins.Nous recherchons des partenaires fiables et engagés, désireux de contribuer au succès de nos projets de dropshipping. Si vous êtes passionné par le développement web, le design, et le SEO, et que vous répondez aux critères ci-dessus, nous serions ravis de vous entendre.Pour postuler :Envoyez-nous votre CV, un portfolio de vos travaux précédents, et une brève description de votre expérience avec WooCommerce et le dropshipping. Merci d'inclure également vos disponibilités pour une première réunion virtuelle.Nous sommes impatients de collaborer avec vous pour mener nos projets au succès !Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00Posted On: February 17, 2024 19:24 UTCCategory: Web DesignCountry: Sint Maarten (Dutch part)"

input: "Opportunity:The Production Coordinator works closely with the Product Owner to keep software development projects well organized and on target by creating and managing comprehensive project plans involving tasks, dependencies, resources, budgets, and timeframes.The Production Coordinator must be highly detail-oriented. You will help track budgets and production schedules, create UI mockups, produce design specifications, and help test deliveries to help turn the client’s visions into reality. You have experience translating client requirements to technically appropriate specifications and vice versa. High-level familiarity with mobile game and web application technology stacks is desired. You need to bring awareness of the technology landscape to research new-to-us technologies and determine if existing skill sets would be applicable.Because Robot Sea Monster is a startup environment, the Production Coordinator can be called to fill many roles and must be flexible while managing multiple projects and responsibilities.The Production Coordinator is a full-time position, and we expect the workload to be 40 hours a week while the production for your assigned projects is active. You must be available to attend daily stand-ups, coordinate with a distributed multidisciplinary team, and complete all tasks on time and to specification. While the position is a remote work contract, you must have at least four hours overlap with the Studio time from 9 am to 5 pm PT.Roles and Responsibilities:Help the Product Owner remotely manage an international team of artists and programmers.Create and maintain production budgets and hours in Monday.Assist in building production bids, budgets, schedules, and proposals from templates.Assist in tracking project progress and updating the Monday platform.Help manage the team through task costing, prioritization, and delegation.Take and distribute organized and actionable meeting notes during daily scrum meetings.Manage the QA process; help drive and lead bug finding and tracking. Acess to an iOS or Android device is required.Prepare reporting based on team velocity, point burndown, and budget burnup.Support the production team in maintaining a high level of product quality.Assist in creating wireframe mockups based on the Creative Director’s plans when needed.Assist in implementing, debugging, and maintaining the user interface.Assist in maintaining and organizing game/app design documents and user experience diagrams.Required Skills:You must have a sharp eye for detail, with the ability to notice minor discrepancies. This skill is crucial to recognize and address errors or changes before they escalate into significant issues.Prior experience in both Agile and Waterfall methodologies. Must be adept at handling dynamic Agile environments and managing Waterfall projects with fixed schedules and evolving scopes.Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.Excellent time management skills.Excellent computer literacy skills.Experience playing video, web, or mobile games.Ability to work with cross-functional development teams, especially programmers and artists.Knowledge of upcoming internet trends and themes.Fluent in both written and conversational English.Bachelor's degree or equivalent life experience.Work Environment:Robot Sea Monster is a fully remote company with team members across the globe. We expect you to provide the appropriate computer, peripherals, and software needed for this position, in addition to the high-speed internet, mic, and camera required for video conferencing and voice calls. Robot Sea Monster will provide access to all team systems and any proprietary software or hardware required for a project.You will need to be available via Google Meet, Slack, and email during designated work hours. Additional hours may be required when we need to meet project deadlines and for periodic client meetings. Hours will fluctuate based on the number of projects, project scale, and project timelines.Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00Posted On: February 17, 2024 22:38 UTCCategory: Digital Project ManagementSkills:Production Planning, Communications, Project Management, SoftwareSkills: Production Planning, Communications, Project Management, SoftwareCountry: United States"
output: Automated Excel workflows using excel, google to create dashboards and custom macros, improving reporting speed and reducing manual effort for clients.

input: "Expensify is a team of generalists developing today's leading expense management tool. Maintaining our reputation as an innovative leader in the world of finance requires an incredibly reliable and secure system for processing financial transactions. Accordingly, we primarily leverage time-tested languages, but we're looking to unify our front-end across platforms. For this, we're leveraging React Native and are looking toward the community on Upwork to help solve a variety of problems, both big and small, related to this migration.Please see the GitHub issue for full details: github.com/Expensify/App/issues/36832Your Proposal:- You *must* post a proposal for how you will fix this issue in the GitHub issue linked above.- Your proposal should include a technical explanation of the changes you will make. You are not required to submit the final solution or code along with your proposal.- Your proposal will be reviewed.- If your proposal is accepted, you should post the proposal in Upwork and you will be hired for the job.- AFTER your proposal is accepted in Upwork and you have accepted the offer, you may submit the code to implement your solution. To submit the code, go to the Expensify/App GitHub repo where you'll create a fork of our codebase. You'll create a branch on that fork, and when your code is ready for review, you'll create a pull request in our repository to merge your code into our codebase. Include screenshots and confirmation that you have tested the pull request on all platforms. Our engineers will review the code, and approve and merge when the code meets our requirements.Please review our Contributor Guidelines before submitting a proposal - github.com/Expensify/App/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md**Important:** As documented in our CONTRIBUTING.md, payment amounts are variable, dependent on any regressions your work causes.Budget: $500Posted On: February 20, 2024 07:21 UTCCategory: Mobile App DevelopmentCountry: United States"
output: Delivered expensify, team, generalists-based improvements by transforming ad-hoc tasks into repeatable, automated processes that improved productivity and accuracy for clients.
